properties.name: BitSight - new breach found

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: BitSight: Alert for new breach in {{Companyname}}.

properties.query:
let timeframe = 24h;
BitSightBreaches
| where ingestion_time() > ago(timeframe)
| extend Severity = toreal(Severity)
| extend Severity = case( Severity == 1, "Low",
                          Severity == 2, "Medium",
                          Severity == 3, "High",
                          "Informational")
| project DateCreated, Companyname, Severity, PreviwURL, GUID
properties.description: 'Rule helps to detect a new breach generated in BitSight.'
